description: The langage that the bot uses. You can add your own translations in the src/locales folder.
channel categories of Discord where the bot will work
channels to ignore in the category
roles that can access to the config (not implemented yet)
Message that will be displayed when the context is cleared
Number of messages that the bot will ignore (starting to the beginning of the chat history)
List of all the models that Spellscord can use to answer the user (the order counts as priority order)
The text that will be append at the end of the message
endDisclaimer: Important: Spellscord can make mistakes. Consider checking important information.
